short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of a customized direct reduction iron test system.
description: Natural Resources Canada-CanmetENERGY require a custom built direct reduction iron test system.
tags: Customized direct reduction of iron test system
full_summary:
# Title: Custom Direct Reduction of Iron Test System Procurement Opportunity

## Title (English/French):
23375-240204 Custom DRI Test System
23375-240204 Installation d'essai de réduction directe du fer conçue sur mesure

## Contract Information
### Reference Number (English/French):
- Reference Number: WS4390912308-Doc4628896124
- Reference Number (français): WS4390912308-Doc4628896124

### Amendment Information
- Amendment Number: 3 (English),
  Nombre de modification: 3 (français)

### Solicitation Information
- Solicitation Number: WS4390912308 (English)
  Numéro de sollicitation: WS4390912308 (français)

### Publication and Deadline Information
- Publication Date: 11 June 2024 (English)
  Date de publication: 11 juin 2024 (français)
  Tender Closing Date: 15 July 2024 at 14:00 ET (Eastern Time) (English)
  Date de clôture des offres : 15 juillet 2024 à 14:00 (heure du Québec) (français)

### Notice Information
- Notice Number: None

### Details

This post is an official notice of a procurement opportunity for a Custom DRI Test System.

**Procurement Details**
- Category: GD (Government Purchasing Agency)
  Type of procurement : Demande de proposition (Request for Proposal) (English) / Demand de proposition
- UNSPSC (UN International Classification of Goods): 41100000
  Description: Laboratory and scientific equipment
- Subject matter/ description: The procurement is for a Customized Direct Reduction of Iron Test System (DRI) that includes simulation of conditions prevailing in a direct reduction shaft furnace.
  
**Field Installation**

The system to be installed is at:
- Regions of delivery: Ottawa, National Capital Region (NCR) (English/French)
  Directions of delivery: Ottawa, Région de la capitale nationale (RCN) (English/French)
- Contracting entity address: 11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QUÉBEC, K1A 0S5, Canada (English/French)

**Contact Information**
- Contracting Entity Name: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) and /
